textBeforeTable: Technical Details Product Photos Part Numbers $69.99 Find A Dealer Shop Online    Watch Video    Twister Throttle Tubes are compatible with all Pro Taper handlebars and Renthal 7/8" handlebars with the standard bearing insert. Pro Taper’s Twister throttle tube is constructed from quality anodized billet aluminum. The sealed radial ball bearing and polymer bushing allow for a consistent and smooth throttle operation while a knurled grip mounting area ensures a vice-like grip bond. The Pro Taper Twister Throttle tubes are used by top-level pro teams and riders world wide. Twister Tubes Throttle Tubes \ Twister Tubes Products \ Home \ You are here:
